name: FALLEN (itch) (Echo Fiend)
description:
Officially* the BEST One-handed Skill-based Speedrun-adjacent Falling Simulator EVER MADE! Controls

FALLEN is designed to be played one-handed. Keyboard arrow keys/controller d-pad are the only necessary inputs. There may be some unintended consequences from playing with two hands, but for reference the PICO-8 controls are Arrow Keys, X & C. These controls are available to view by clicking the controller icon next to the game.  Mouse input is not recognised by PICO-8, although you may need to click on the game window before it recognises other inputs.

Play

Try your best to rack up a high score, or alternatively try to beat the game as quickly as possible! 

Developer's Notes

I hope you enjoy my game! Thanks for playing and have a great day!

Lots of Love,
Echo x

Please Note: Even though this game has a suggested donation amount to download, I feel like I must make it especially clear that payment is not expected for this game.

*by 'official' I mean I just wrote the word 'official' and not that the statement is backed up by any reputable organisation. Although let's be honest, awards and titles don't make a game better or worse, they just help with getting people to play it.
